name: Aatrox
description: Aatrox was the first to find freedom once more, corrupting and transforming those foolish

name: Akali
description: Abandoning the Kinkou Order and her title of the Fist of Shadow, Akali now strikes alone, ready to be the deadly weapon her people need.

name: Ambessa
description: As a Noxian general, she embodies a deadly combination of ruthless strength and fearless resolve in battle

name: Aphelios
description: Emerging from moonlight's shadow with weapons drawn, Aphelios kills the enemies of his faith in brooding silence

name: Ekko
description: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko is able to manipulate time to twist any situation to his advantage

name: Hecarim
description: Hecarim is a spectral fusion of man and beast, cursed to ride down the souls of the living for all eternity.

name: Jinx
description: An unhinged and impulsive criminal from the undercity, Jinx is haunted by the consequences of her past

name: Nilah
description: Nilah is an ascetic warrior from a distant land, seeking the world's deadliest, most titanic opponents so that she might challenge and destroy them.

name: Pyke
description: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish

name: Thresh
description: Thresh is an ambitious and restless specter of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets

name: Vander
description: Vander was a supporting character in Arcane. He was once the determined and zealous unspoken leader and protector of the undercity.

name: Vi
description: Vi is a hotheaded, impulsive, and fearsome woman with very little respect for authority. She has always been a shrewd survivor.

name: Kyubi
description: A cunning spirit of fire and illusion, its nine tails dance like flickering flames.

name: Chronos Sentinel
description: An ancient guardian forged from brass and forgotten magic, its three eyes see past, present, and future.

name: Argus
description: A magnificent beast whose hundred-eyed plumage holds the secrets of the cosmos.

name: Morgrath
description: A master of forbidden arts, he commands the very essence of darkness and despair.

name: Sol-Rishi
description: An enlightened master whose body is a conduit for pure solar energy and ancient wisdom.

name: Lyra
description: A protector of the ancient woods, eternally bound to her spectral wolf companion.

name: Grizelda
description: A cunning merchant whose insatiable greed for treasure is legendary in every marketplace.

name: Coralia
description: A siren of the deep, her haunting songs lure sailors to their watery graves.

name: Alistair
description: A brilliant inventor whose marvelous steam-powered creations defy the laws of nature.

name: Pyralis
description: A volatile elemental of pure, untamed fire, born from the world's molten core.

name: Gravewood
description: A vengeful spirit of the ancient forest, its bark is iron and its roots drink the sorrow of the land.

name: K'tharr
description: An ancient horror from a forgotten epoch, its slumbering presence poisons the minds of mortals.
